tag_list: mobile-media, people-centric, social-media, video-platforms, research, collaborative-business-design, connections, measurement
overview:
Helping Brands Move Closer to People through Mobile solutions, New Media and Integrated platforms, using research and collaborative business design.

Deanna Lawrence is a global strategist in the fields of digital media and peer-to-peer collaboration. She is especially passionate about advancement in mobile technology, measurement, online observation, and the ability of “People” to play a stronger role in influencing brand performance..
